data.name: valChainOfCustodySampleHasNoRef
data.value: Chain of custody sample has not sample reference.

data.value: Chain of custody sample [{0}] is not listed in the list of available samples.

data.value: No measurements are specified in an analysis record for the result [{0}].

data.value: No analyte is specified for a measurement in result [{0}].

data.value: No chain of custody batchs are defined in the ADX document.

data.value: A processing group has an invalid, missing or empty identifier.

data.name: valSamplePotentialQAQCListedAsSample
